name: A Most Peculiar Request
description:
Made for Beregon's themed horror jam #7

Mr. CraftLove,

 As you know I am a purveyor of fine art. I’ve managed several museums along the East coast. During that time, I had the privilege of working with the finest artist I had ever known. One Arthur Ward. Five years ago, he left to visit a cousin back East.

 It’s been those 5 years since I’ve heard from him. Just a few days ago, A week before the winter solstice, an e-mail arrived. Arthur said he needed my immediate assistance. He had a new work of art. One that played upon the light of a full Moon. As the winter solstice was on the full Moon this year. I was to come at once.

 A train ticket had been purchased in my name.

 

I will report back when I return.

 

Sincerely, Clyde Otto
